title: Ticket #2771: GPU on Windows
description:
On Windows Vista and higher, the session 0 isolation prevents access to the GPU, so jobs that want to use it fail. The only solution currently available is to run Condor as a personal Condor under a logged in user. This is not acceptable for many users. NVidia came up with a solution for their Tesla drivers and we can probably duplicate it. The following are needed.

  • A sandboxed/dedicated user account. Condor already has this, the slot user account.
  • Determine if the slot user can be used in conjunction with specifying session 1 when creating a process using CreateProcessAsUser. So far most of the example code out there relies on the inherited system account, which we do not want a job to have.

Reference: http://forums.nvidia.com/index.php?showtopic=93450
